attributes.additional_details: they think that they have nothing in life people who’s different from other needs to stand up and  say this is who I I’m and I’m gonna love myself for who I’m and if you don’t then you no we’re the delete bottom people needs to understand they ain’t different they are normal like any one else all they went is to loved like anyone else so we all went this stop they have heart like normal people the more signs the better for online Disability bullying to stop
attributes.background: I went online bullying about disability’s to stop what about the people who’s different from others that don’t like talking about we’re disability you ever think that’s why young people has depression and the depression gets that bad they suicide comes to here head a lot

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Make online abuse of disabled people a specific criminal offence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551468

Make stirring up hatred based on disability a criminal offence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334278
